thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: China’s Iron Ore Belt and Road Won’t Save Steel

author: Nathaniel Taplin
title: China’s Iron Ore Belt and Road Won’t Save Steel
text:
Happy times for steelmakers—and the iron miners feeding them—are here again. That’s largely thanks to China. But what happens when China’s economy stumbles again?
Iron ore miners like BHP Billiton and Rio Tinto are hoping the rest of Asia can pick up the slack, with a little help from China’s “One Belt One Road” infrastructure push—billed as the biggest regional development initiative since World War II. The idea is to build a “new silk road” of rail, port and power infrastructure throughout Asia, boosting China’s exports...
